O

onlyMenuItemId(Scanner, MainMenu) - Static method in class Class.customScanner
Checks that only numbers are allowed in the MenuID, if not Checks that the menuitem ID exist if not, It will otherwise prompt the user to enter the correct menuID/numbers
onlyPromoItemId(Scanner, MainMenu) - Static method in class Class.customScanner
Checks that only numbers are allowed in the promoID, if not Checks that the promo ID exist if not, It will otherwise prompt the user to enter the correct promoID/number
onlyTableID(Scanner, ArrayList<Ordering>) - Static method in class Class.customScanner
Checks that only numbers are allowed in the tableID, if not Checks that the tableID ID exist if not, It will otherwise prompt the user to enter the correct menuID/numbers
OrderHistory - Class in Class
This is a OrderHistory Class It represent the List of order record that the restaurant had.
OrderHistory() - Constructor for class Class.OrderHistory
OrderHistory Constructor When OrderHistory is created it will load the order history data from OrderHistory.dat file
orderHistory - Variable in class Class.OrderHistory
ArrayList of paid Ordering history
orderID - Variable in class Class.Ordering
An identification for the orders
Ordering - Class in Class
This is the Ordering class Any functions related to ordering at the restaurant (Adding, updating and removing an order) will happen here It implements serializable to allow us to serialize and deserialize to a file (After oder is paid for) It also implements the Generate Id interface to be able to generate a random id for the integer
Ordering(int, int, int, MainMenu, String, Date, double, boolean) - Constructor for class Class.Ordering
Creates a new Ordering item with the following parameters.
Ordering() - Constructor for class Class.Ordering
This is a default constructor Creates an empty new order object
orderList - Static variable in class Class.Main
This is the arraylist of orderList
